thread.title: Rich Chigga & Frank Yang Discuss Consciousness & Lucid Dreams
thread.title_full: Rich Chigga & Frank Yang Discuss Consciousness & Lucid Dreams

author: Hypebeast (info@hypebeast.com)
title: Rich Chigga & Frank Yang Discuss Consciousness & Lucid Dreams

organizations.name: rich chigga & frank yang discuss consciousness & lucid

text:
For its latest short, 88Rising recruited Internet personalities Rich Chigga and Frank Yang for a discussion of consciousness and lucid dreams. Here, Rich Chigga (also known as Brian Imanuel) reveals to Frank that he often experiences lucid dreams while taking naps, so much that he takes naps just to experience them. As per usual, Frank gets philosophical speaks on the ideas of consciousness and the subjectivity of existence. Watch the entertaining yet educational video above.
Read more at Hypebeast.com
